3. In this case, the cell at row_index=8 and column_name="constitutional ticket" has a value of "(none)", indicating that there was no constitutional ticket in this row.
4. Compare the results: Since the claim requires the absence of a constitutional ticket when Charles B Sears is on the Republican ticket, our comparison will be between the actual result (there's no constitutional ticket) and what we expect if the claim were false (a constitutional ticket should exist).
